Package Participation

Class Summary
ApplicationLogic This class implements the logic of the "Foo's Participation System".
ApplicationLogic.Counter An inner class to keep track of fresh IDs for customer, service, and participation.
Customer An instance of this class represents a customer.
Customer.ServiceInfo This inner class is just a helper.
Discount An object of this class represents a 'discount token'.
Discount_1000 This discount token gives 50 euro discount to every 1000 euro participations.
Discount_5pack This discount token gives a 10 euro discount, if the customer participates in at least 5 services, each with value at least 100 euro.
Participation An instance of this class represents a unit of participation to a certain service.
Persistence This class provides the link to the database, which is used to store the data of the Foo System.
Service An instance of this class represents some busines, e.g.
